snippet: The Washington Wizards were dealt a severe blow to their N.B.A. playoff hopes when the All-Star point guard John Wall injured his left hand and wrist.
abstract: Washington Wizards point-guard John Wall is sidelined indefinitely with injured hand and wrist, dealing severe blow to their playoff hopes; other NBA playoff news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards were dealt a severe blow to their N.B.A. playoff hopes when the All-Star point guard John Wall injured his left hand and wrist.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Wizards’ Wall Out Indefinitely
